input.sentences: she was excited for the big day ahead .
first they went to an art exhibit .
people wandered and stared at the various works .
the crowd grew larger and our friends went off to do other things .
after the exhibit | our friend got her ears pierced .
output.sentences: We were excited for the day that we were about to have.
We were going to a beautiful art showing!
In the beginning, it was just us walking around being bored, which was kind of a disappointment.
But later on during the showing we found lots of people that had similar interests to ours!
We finally exited the showing with our new found friends and had a great night together.
